CustomField.description: This is a toggle to activate or deactivate a Filter. Set this to false so that the system will ignore this configuration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Instead of deleting a filter, Uncheck to deactivate the filter. Alternatively, if you don't want user to be able to turn off this filter, set Display Filter to False(Unchecked) but set Active to True(Checked).
CustomField.label: Active
